fields.label: Conda environment name:
fields.info: Name of the conda environment to activate in WSL.

fields.label: Inference prompt template:
fields.info: Prompt template used at inference time, make sure it matches the finetuned version.

fields.label: Dataset name:
fields.info: Dataset to train the model from a local file.

fields.label: Training split:
fields.info: Training split name for your dataset.

fields.label: Text columns:
fields.info: Columns that match your dataset to populate the training prompt.

fields.label: Text template:
fields.info: Prompt template to finetune the model, it uses replacement from with the columns.

fields.label: Corpus strategy:
fields.info: Do you want to join the samples or process them one by one.

fields.label: Source max length:
fields.info: Max numbers of tokens per traning sample.

fields.label: Pad to max length:
fields.info: Add PAD token to the training sample until the max number of tokens.

fields.label: Compute dtype:
fields.info: Data type for model weights and adapter weights.
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter compute_dtype?

fields.label: Quant type:
fields.info: Quantization data type to use. Should be one of fp4 or nf4.
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter quant_type?

fields.label: Double quant:
fields.info: Whether to use nested quantization where the quantization constants from the first quantization are quantized again.
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter double_quant?

fields.label: Lora r:
fields.info: Lora attention dimension.
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter lora_r?

fields.label: Lora alpha:
fields.info: The alpha parameter for Lora scaling
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter lora_alpha?

fields.label: Lora dropout:
fields.info: The dropout probability for Lora layers
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter lora_dropout?

fields.label: Eval dataset size:
fields.info: Size of the validation dataset, a number or 0-1 percentage.
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter eval_dataset_size?

fields.label: Seed:
fields.info: Random seed for initialization.
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter training_args_seed?

fields.label: Data seed:
fields.info: Random seed to be used with data samplers.
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter training_args_data_seed?

fields.label: Per device train batch size:
fields.info: The batch size per GPU for training.
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter per_device_train_batch_size?

fields.label: Per device eval batch size:
fields.info: The batch size per GPU for evaluation.
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter per_device_eval_batch_size?

fields.label: Gradient accumulation steps:
fields.info: Number of updates steps to accumulate the gradients for, before performing a backward/update pass
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter gradient_accumulation_steps?

fields.label: Enable gradient checkpointing:
fields.info: Use gradient checkpointing. Recommended to save the memory.
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter gradient_checkpointing?

fields.label: Learning rate:
fields.info: The initial learning rate for AdamW
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter learning_rate?

fields.label: Number of epochs:
fields.info: How many complete passes the model will make over the entire training dataset.
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter num_train_epochs?

fields.label: Max steps:
fields.info: Training will be stopped when this number of steps is reached, regardless of the number of epochs.
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter max_steps?

fields.label: Checkpoint output dir
fields.info: Directory to save the checkpoints.
fields.learnMore: Can you tell me more about the Hugging Face trainer parameter output_dir?
